thread.section_title: Fiix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fiix | fiixsoftware.com
thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: We implemented FIIX (Maintenance Assistant back then) about 2 1/2 years ago. We have worked diligently to get all of our assets into the system and to convert all of our Preventive, Predictive, and Breakdown Maintenance records to this system. It is so much easier and less time consuming if you put the effort in up front and get the results you need. We now use this system for all of our Maintenance KPI's and are ready to move on to new features and modules. This is the best Maintenance Management software system I've ever used.
